con:parameter.con:name: filter
con:parameter.con:option: Source eq 'SMP' and (Status eq '3') and LastUpdate eq 'ALL' and Reporter eq 'S0000315119'

entry.value: Source eq 'SMP' and (Status eq '3') and LastUpdate eq 'ALL'
?$filter=({filter})&$skip=0&$top=1001Source eq 'SMP' and (Status eq 'S' or Status eq 'C' or Status eq 'M') and LastUpdate eq 'ALL'

Source eq 'SMP' and (Status eq '5' or Status eq 'N') and LastUpdate eq 'ALL'

con:request.name: postMsg
con:request.con:request:
{
    "Reporter": "S0000315119",
    "Description": "Subject:
This is a test for long text in subject This is a test for long text in subject This is a test for long text in subjects
Dfj(*(*(*)*@*(^(!@P!OMKJNL{
“}
“DIOPHJSDO)|)SDL:J
I)*)(@*)(*@
|”J
‘
‘
‘
[[\]1`
~~!~!~
!
~
!
~!
~
!~!}~!
Hello,
I am Amélie Lamirand and I am part of SAP Digital Learning Center of Excellence  Survey Management Service, and I send you a little mail just in case you would sometimes need a survey for product or external need, we can help you from A to Z, from survey creation to results detailed analysis. Our team (SAP Survey Management Service) as the official survey service provider within SAP use a platform, which has been approved by SAP Data Protection  Privacy Office, IT Security and the works councils ?
To summarize quickly:
- A little survey demo: https://surveys.sap.com/jfe/form/SV_87YYOEGjZNhQ2Ox
- A little video on our service: https://video.sap.com/media/t/0_2ddi70tn 
- Terms and conditions of our service: https://wiki.wdf.sap.corp/wiki/display/KTEKMTC/Survey+Management+Service 
- The request form to fill out if needed: https://surveys.sap.com/SE/?SID=SV_82I7oynNK85qtlX
Th different steps to create a survey are:
- Complete the request form
- Create the survey in an excel file
- We create the survey in our tool based on your need
- Send if necessary the invitations to participants and inform you regularly on the status of the number of responses, and we can send reminders 
- Then we have the results analysis phase, results can be delivered in detailed excel file, with charts in PPT, in Word, online with or wihout a password to access it these results can be sent in one time or regularly, for example weekly.
- Then, depending on if this is an ongoing, non-recurring, or recurring survey, we close it and we send the final excel detailed results.
- Our surveys can be used internally or externally.
Don’t hesitate if you have some needs or questions ?
Th different steps to create a survey are:
- Complete the request form
- Create the survey in an excel file
- We create the survey in our tool based on your need
- Send if necessary the invitations to participants and inform you regularly on the status of the number of responses, and we can send reminders 
- Then we have the results analysis phase, results can be delivered in detailed excel file, with charts in PPT, in Word, online with or wihout a password to access it these results can be sent in one time or regularly, for example weekly.
- Then, depending on if this is an ongoing, non-recurring, or recurring survey, we close it and we send the final excel detailed results.
- Our surveys can be used internally or externally.
Don’t hesitate if you have some needs or questions ?",
    "Step2Repro": "",
    "BusinessImpact": ""
}

con:config.script: testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Prop_Project_SN_User", "") testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Prop_Project_SN_Password", "") testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("SNOW_BASE64", "") testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Prop_Project_BC_Username", "") testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Prop_Project_BC_Password", "") testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("BC_BASE64", "")

import sun.misc.BASE64Encoder; BASE64Encoder encode = new BASE64Encoder() String authorizationValue = ""
String user = 'I504874' String password = ''
authorizationValue = user + ":" + password base64 = encode.encode(authorizationValue.getBytes()) log.info base64

con:testCase.name: prepareTestData

con:config.script:
import sun.misc.BASE64Encoder; BASE64Encoder encode = new BASE64Encoder() String authorizationValue = "" String user = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_SN_User") String password = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_SN_Password") authorizationValue = user + ":" + password base64 = encode.encode(authorizationValue.getBytes())
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("SNOW_BASE64", "") testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("SNOW_BASE64", base64)
def suiteLogon = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.testSuites["Logon"] suiteLogon.setPropertyValue("ReRunCount","0")

S0009460456 Logon

con:config.script:
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_Cookie", "") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_SpName", "") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_RelayState1", "") def Cookie = "" testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_Cookie", Cookie)
def userName = testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Prop_Case_UserName") testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_UserName",userName)

con:testStep.name: copy saml data

con:testSuite.name: Create in LP-Non Front runner Incident XX-SER-SAPSMP-SUP

con:testCase.name: 1 Create_XX-SER-SAPSMP-SUP

con:config.script: String timeStamp = (new Date().format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")) landscape=testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_System") def subject = "API(Columbus) created from LP using XX-SER-SAPSMP-SUP in " +landscape + " instance created at " + timeStamp testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Subject", subject)

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="x-csrf-token" value="Fetch"/> <con:entry key="Host" value="${#Project#Prop_Project_Host}"/> <con:entry key="DataServiceVersion" value="2.0"/> <con:entry key="sap-contextid-accept" value="header "/> </xml-fragment>

con:configuration.scriptText:
def response = messageExchange.responseContent def root = new XmlSlurper().parseText(response) def properties = root.content.properties def test_case = messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase
test_case.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Pointer",properties.Pointer.toString())
log.info ("Columbus log: properties.Action is " + properties.Action+" Should be SEND2SAP") log.info ("Columbus log: system is " + properties.Sysnr.toString()+" Should be "+ test_case.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_System")) log.info ("Columbus log: Priority is " + properties.Priority.toString()+" Should be "+ test_case.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_Priority")) log.info ("Columbus log: Description is " + properties.LongText.toString()+" Should be "+test_case.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_Description") )
assert properties.Action == "SEND2SAP" assert properties.Sysnr.toString() == test_case.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_System") assert properties.Priority.toString() == test_case.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_Priority") assert properties.LongText.toString() == test_case.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_Description")

con:testCase.name: 2 Verify the incident is created in BC

con:configuration.scriptText:
def response = messageExchange.responseContent def root = new XmlSlurper().parseText(response).content.properties def test_case = messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase
test_case.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Guid",root.Guid.toString())
log.info ("Columbus log: root.ComponentLabel is " + root.ComponentLabel+" Should be XX-SER-SAPSMP-SUP") log.info ("Columbus log: root.ErpNumber is " + root.ErpNumber+" Should be 1208936") log.info ("Columbus log: root.Status is " + root.Status+" Should be E0001")
assert root.ComponentLabel == "XX-SER-SAPSMP-SUP" assert root.ErpNumber == "1208936" assert root.Status == "E0001"

con:testCase.name: 4 Verify case is transferred to SNOW

con:configuration.scriptText:
def response = messageExchange.responseContent def root = (new XmlSlurper().parseText(response)).result def testCase = messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase
testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_TaskID", root.sys_id.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_ComponentID",root.u_app_component.value.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_CustomerID",root.account.value.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_Reporter",root.contact.value.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_Installation",root.u_sold_item.value.toString())
log.info ("Columbus log: root.priority is " + root.priority+" Should be 2") log.info ("Columbus log: root.state is " + root.state+" Should be 1") log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_current_channel is " + root.u_current_channel+" Should be 1") log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_case_language is " + root.u_case_language.toString()) log.info ("Columbus log: root.correlation_id is " + root.correlation_id + " Should be "+testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Pointer")) log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_source_channel is " + root.u_source_channel+" Should be portal") log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_steps_to_reproduce.toString() is " + root.u_steps_to_reproduce.toString()) log.info ("Columbus log: root.business_impact.toString() is " + root.business_impact.toString()) log.info ("Columbus log: root.short_description is " + root.short_description+" Should be "+testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Subject")) log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_responsible_party is " + root.u_responsible_party+" Should be sno")
assert root.priority == "2" assert root.state == "1" assert root.u_current_channel == "1" assert root.u_case_language.toString().contains("en") assert root.correlation_id==testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Pointer") assert root.u_source_channel=="portal" assert root.u_steps_to_reproduce.toString().contains("Please provide step-by-step instructions on how to reproduce your issue") assert root.business_impact.toString().contains("This is a SOAPUI Test . No impact ,thx")
assert root.u_responsible_party=="sno"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def httpResponse = context.response def response = new JsonSlurper().parseText(httpResponse).result.u_key //assert response == context.testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Component") // verify component is CEC-PRO-GIY log.info ("Columbus log: component is " + response +" should be 0000070362") assert response=="0000070362"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def httpResponse = context.response def response = new JsonSlurper().parseText(httpResponse).result.number
log.info ("Columbus log: customer is " + response +" should be 0001208936") assert response=="0001208936"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def httpResponse = context.response def installation = new JsonSlurper().parseText(httpResponse).result.u_sold_item_name def system = new JsonSlurper().parseText(httpResponse).result.u_correlation_id
log.info ("Columbus log: installation is " + installation +" should be SAP SERVICE CLOUD") log.info ("Columbus log: system is " + system +" should be 0090402316")
assert installation =="SAP SERVICE CLOUD" assert system =="0090402316"

con:testStep.name: Verify text is transferred to SNOW

log.info ("Columbus log: Component is " + properties.Component+" Should be CEC-SRV-FSM") log.info ("Columbus log: Customer is " + properties.Customer.toString()+" Should be 0001208936") log.info ("Columbus log: Installation is " + properties.Installation.toString()+" Should be 0090402316") log.info ("Columbus log: SystemNumber is " + properties.SystemNumber.toString()+" Should be 000000000740794746")
assert properties.Component.toString() == "CEC-SRV-FSM" assert properties.Customer.toString() == "0001208936" assert properties.Installation.toString() == "0090402316" // in dev instance the system number is 000000000740794746=FSM_EU assert properties.SystemNumber.toString()=="000000000740794746"

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="x-csrf-token" value="Fetch"/> <con:entry key="Host" value="${#Project#Prop_Project_Host}"/> <con:entry key="DataServiceVersion" value="2.0"/> <con:entry key="sap-contextid-accept" value="header "/> </xml-fragment>

con:configuration.scriptText:
def response = messageExchange.responseContent def root = new XmlSlurper().parseText(response) def properties = root.content.properties def test_case = messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase
test_case.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Pointer",properties.Pointer.toString())
log.info ("Columbus log: properties.Action is " + properties.Action+" Should be SEND2SAP") log.info ("Columbus log: system is " + properties.Sysnr.toString()+" Should be "+ test_case.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_System")) log.info ("Columbus log: Priority is " + properties.Priority.toString()+" Should be "+ test_case.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_Priority")) log.info ("Columbus log: Description is " + properties.LongText.toString()+" Should be "+test_case.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_Description") )
assert properties.RetCode == "0" assert properties.Action == "SEND2SAP" assert properties.Sysnr.toString() == test_case.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_System") assert properties.Priority.toString() == test_case.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_Priority") assert properties.LongText.toString() == test_case.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_Description")

con:testCase.name: 3 Verify case is created in SNOW

con:configuration.scriptText:
def response = messageExchange.responseContent def root = (new XmlSlurper().parseText(response)).result def testCase = messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase
log.info ("Columbus log: root.priority is " + root.priority+" Should be 2") log.info ("Columbus log: root.state is " + root.state+" Should be 1") log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_current_channel is " + root.u_current_channel+" Should be 1") log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_case_language is " + root.u_case_language.toString()) log.info ("Columbus log: root.correlation_id is " + root.correlation_id + "Should be "+testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Pointer")) log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_source_channel is " + root.u_source_channel+" Should be portal") log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_steps_to_reproduce.toString() is " + root.u_steps_to_reproduce.toString()) log.info ("Columbus log: root.business_impact.toString() is " + root.business_impact.toString()) log.info ("Columbus log: root.short_description is " + root.short_description+" Should be "+testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Subject")) log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_responsible_party is " + root.u_responsible_party+" Should be sno")
assert root.priority == "2" assert root.state == "1" assert root.u_current_channel == "1" assert root.u_case_language.toString().contains("en") assert root.short_description==testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Subject") assert root.correlation_id==testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Pointer") assert root.u_source_channel=="portal" assert root.u_responsible_party=="sno" assert root.u_steps_to_reproduce.toString().contains("Please provide step-by-step instructions on how to reproduce your issue") assert root.business_impact.toString().contains("This is a SOAPUI Test . No impact ,thx")
testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_TaskID", root.sys_id.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_ComponentID",root.u_app_component.value.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_CustomerID",root.account.value.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_Reporter",root.contact.value.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_Installation",root.u_sold_item.value.toString())

assert installation =="SAP SERVICE CLOUD" assert system =="0090402316"

def response = messageExchange.responseContent def root = (new XmlSlurper().parseText(response)).result def testCase = messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase
testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_TaskID", root.sys_id.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_ComponentID",root.u_app_component.value.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_CustomerID",root.account.value.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_Reporter",root.contact.value.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_Installation",root.u_sold_item.value.toString())
log.info ("Columbus log: root.priority is " + root.priority+" Should be 2") log.info ("Columbus log: root.state is " + root.state+" Should be 1") log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_current_channel is " + root.u_current_channel+" Should be 1") log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_case_language is " + root.u_case_language.toString()) log.info ("Columbus log: root.correlation_id is " + root.correlation_id + " Should be "+testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Pointer")) log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_source_channel is " + root.u_source_channel+" Should be portal") log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_steps_to_reproduce.toString() is " + root.u_steps_to_reproduce.toString()) log.info ("Columbus log: root.business_impact.toString() is " + root.business_impact.toString()) log.info ("Columbus log: root.short_description is " + root.short_description+" Should be "+testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Subject")) log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_responsible_party is " + root.u_responsible_party+" Should be sno")
assert root.priority == "2" assert root.state == "1" assert root.u_current_channel == "1" assert root.u_case_language.toString().contains("en") assert root.correlation_id==testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Pointer") assert root.u_source_channel=="portal" assert root.u_steps_to_reproduce.toString().contains("Please provide step-by-step instructions on how to reproduce your issue") assert root.business_impact.toString().contains("This is a SOAPUI Test . No impact ,thx") assert root.short_description==testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Subject") assert root.u_responsible_party=="sno"

con:testCase.name: 1 Create a case in SNOW

con:config.script:
String timeStamp = (new Date().format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")) landscape=testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_System") def subject = "API(Columbus) created from SNOW using CEC-SRV-FSM in " +landscape + " instance created at " + timeStamp testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Subject", subject) def system = testRunner.testCase.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_System").toLowerCase()
def soldItem = [ "dev": "75be0d481b65b3009307dceacd4bcb16", "test": "6d3d33fe1b0e7b401ead7403dd4bcbbb" ]
installation=soldItem[system] testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Installation", installation)
def deployedItem = [ "dev": "cffe8584db61bbc04e94838405961945", "test": "00651c3bdb8233802d37a6b6059619db" ]
SystemNo=deployedItem[system] testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_System", SystemNo)
def account = [ "dev": "4bbe229ddb82e300badc7d78f49619ea", "test": "ab52c31e1b8abb001ead7403dd4bcb60" ]
customer=account[system] testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Customer", customer)
def contacts = [ "dev": "66b3b61ddbc2e300badc7d78f496191b", "test": "658e99a6db867f0082154cb1159619a2" ]
contact=contacts[system] testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Contact", contact)

con:restRequest.name: Create case in SNOW
con:restRequest.con:request: { "priority": "${#Project#Prop_Project_Priority}", "short_description": "${#TestSuite#Prop_Suite_Subject}", "u_source_channel": "email", "u_case_language": "en - english", "u_current_channel": "1", "business_impact": "${#Project#Prop_Project_Impact}", "description": "${#Project#Prop_Project_Description}", "urgency": "3", "u_eudp": "NONE", "u_steps_to_reproduce": "${#Project#Prop_Project_Reproduce}", "u_sold_item": "${#TestSuite#Prop_Suite_Installation}", "u_deployed_item": "${#TestSuite#Prop_Suite_System}", "contract": "Contract: 0177015825 - Sold Item: SAP SERVICE CLOUD", "contact": "${#TestSuite#Prop_Suite_Contact}", "u_app_component":"CEC-SRV-FSM", "account": "${#TestSuite#Prop_Suite_Customer}" }

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def httpResponse = context.response def root = new JsonSlurper().parseText(httpResponse).result def testCase = messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase
testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_TaskID", root.sys_id.toString()) testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Pointer", root.correlation_id.toString())

def response = messageExchange.responseContent def root = (new XmlSlurper().parseText(response)).result def testCase = messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase
testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_TaskID", root.sys_id.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_ComponentID",root.u_app_component.value.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_CustomerID",root.account.value.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_Reporter",root.contact.value.toString()) testCase.setPropertyValue("Prop_Case_Installation",root.u_sold_item.value.toString())
log.info ("Columbus log: root.priority is " + root.priority+" Should be 2") log.info ("Columbus log: root.state is " + root.state+" Should be 1") log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_current_channel is " + root.u_current_channel+" Should be 1") log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_case_language is " + root.u_case_language.toString()) log.info ("Columbus log: root.correlation_id is " + root.correlation_id + "Should be "+testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Pointer")) log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_source_channel is " + root.u_source_channel+" Should be email") log.info ("Columbus log: root.short_description is " + root.short_description+" Should be "+testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Subject")) log.info ("Columbus log: root.u_responsible_party is " + root.u_responsible_party+" Should be sno")
assert root.priority == "2" assert root.state == "1" assert root.u_current_channel == "1" assert root.u_case_language.toString().contains("en") assert root.correlation_id==testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_Pointer") assert root.u_source_channel=="email" assert root.u_responsible_party=="sno" assert root.u_steps_to_reproduce.toString().contains("Please provide step-by-step instructions on how to reproduce your issue") assert root.business_impact.toString().contains("This is a SOAPUI Test . No impact ,thx")

assert properties.Action == "SEND2SAP" assert properties.Sysnr.toString() == test_case.testSuite.getPropertyValue("Prop_Suite_System") assert properties.Priority.toString() == test_case.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_Priority") assert properties.LongText.toString() == test_case.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_Description")

con:configuration.scriptText:
def response = messageExchange.responseContent def root = new XmlSlurper().parseText(response) def properties =root.content.properties def test_case = messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase
log.info ("Columbus log: properties.ComponentLabel is " + properties.ComponentLabel+" Should be CEC-SRV-FSM") log.info ("Columbus log: properties.Status is " + properties.Status+" Should be E0020")
assert properties.ComponentLabel == "CEC-SRV-FSM" assert properties.Status == "E0001"

con:testStep.name: verify the text is added to BC json

con:restRequest.name: verify the text is added to BC json

con:testCase.name: 4 Verify the component is also changed in LP

con:testStep.name: verify component is also change in LP

con:restRequest.name: verify component is also change in LP

con:configuration.scriptText:
def response = messageExchange.responseContent def root = new XmlSlurper().parseText(response) def properties = root.content.properties
log.info ("Columbus log: Component is " + properties.Component+" Should be CEC-SRV-FSM") log.info ("Columbus log: Customer is " + properties.Customer.toString()+" Should be 0001208936") log.info ("Columbus log: Installation is " + properties.Installation.toString()+" Should be 0090402316") log.info ("Columbus log: SystemNumber is " + properties.SystemNumber.toString()+" Should be 000000000740794746")
assert properties.Component.toString() == "CEC-SRV-FSM" assert properties.Customer.toString() == "0001208936" assert properties.Installation.toString() == "0090402316" assert properties.SystemNumber.toString()=="000000000740794746"
